quoteText: TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY APPLICABLE LAW YOU EXPRESSLY UNDERSTAND AND AGREE THAT COCOON AND ITS SUBSIDIARIES’ AND AFFILIATES’, AND ITS LICENSORS’ (“COCOON PARTIES”) TOTAL LIABILITY TO YOU FROM ALL CAUSES OF ACTION AND UNDER ALL THEORIES OF LIABILITY WILL BE LIMITED TO THE AMOUNTS PAID TO COCOON BY YOU FOR THE SOFTWARE OR, IN THE EVENT THAT COCOON HAS MADE THE SOFTWARE AVAILABLE TO YOU WITHOUT CHARGE, ANY SUCH TOTAL LIABILITY WILL BE LIMITED TO TWENTY DOLLARS ($20).
title: Any liability on behalf of the service is only limited to the fees you paid as a user
